title: Original Research & Studies - Semrush Blog
description: Original research and studies are the best way to gain insights into the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing. Here are data-driven reports, surveys, and case studies to help you optimize your online presence.
content: Original Research & Studies10 min read96 Content Marketing Statistics You Need to Know for 2024Ready to enhance your 2024 content strategy? Check out these 96 content marketing statistics for inspiration. Based on Semrush research and data.Margarita LoktionovaApr 10, 2024Original Research & Studies7 min read10 Small Business Trends for 2024Learn the top small business trends for 2024 to stay ahead of the competition and keep employees happy.Ankit VoraFeb 19, 2024Original Research & Studies14 min readSEO Mistakes: Common SEO Issues & How to Fix ThemSEO issues can damage your Google rankings. Learn how to avoid and fix the most common SEO mistakes.Kari DearieJan 24, 2024Original Research & Studies1 min readRanking Factors [Semrush Study]We analyzed a sample of 16,298 English keywords, all of which have more than 100 monthly searches. For each keyword, we collected the search engine results pages (SERPs) and analyzed the top 20 positions and their performance across a number of factors, ending up with a total of 300,000 positions.Marcus ToberJan 04, 2024Original Research & Studies5 min readCollaborative SEO: How Annalect Uses Semrush to Elevate Their Team’s EffectivenessAt Annalect Spain, the SEO team uses Semrush to build strategies, share data, and collaborate on client projects.
